comment: I was pretty happy with it, subtle sweetness and the mango went well with the hops.  A bit thin, though I think that has more to do with my process than the recipe.
Did you add the oats and wheat in during boil and not in your mash?

Sorry for the late reply, I don't know why there aren't notifications for these things.  The oats are a typo, I added those during the mash.  The lactose was added with 10 minutes left in the boil.  I'll update the recipe to reflect this.  Cheers.
Nevermind, it won't let me alter that.  For future reference, the white wheat and the oats are added in the MASH not the boil.  I add the lactose with 10 minutes left in the boil.
